fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Research and innovation, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Keeping current and involved in CETA activities both at home and abroad.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
position: Director of Government and International Relations
goals__remit: The Canadian Cattlemen's Association (CCA) structure represents every phase of the production system; the purebred, cow/calf, backgrounding and feedlot sectors. Our association was founded by producers and is led by a producer-elected board of directors from across Canada.
